## Checklist
- [ ] Linked to an issue
- [ ] Updated the changelog
- [ ] Added tests
- [ ] Updated the spec
- [ ] Checked native-image compatibility
- [ ] No `commons` package changes (if there are any, please update the GraphQL version in [GraphQL tools](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/graphql-tools))
